403.title: Forbidden
403.body: You do not have access to this page.
403.linkText: Go back to the front page

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.body: This page doesn't seem to exist.
notFound.linkText: Go back to the front page
notFound.objectiveBody: This objective doesn't seem to exist.
notFound.keyResultBody: This key result doesn't seem to exist.
notFound.measurementBody: This measurement doesn't seem to exist.

kpi.noGraph: Not enough data to display graph
kpi.archived: This measurement is archived and no longer visible.

updateFrequency.label: Update frequency
updateFrequency.help: The frequency with which the measurement is expected to be updated with progress data. Used to determine whether a measurement's previous update was within the given interval, or if it should be considered outdated.

plain.label: Measurement
plain.description: A measurement that the team or department wishes to keep an eye on. These are only displayed under the same item's measurement tab.

keyFigure.label: Key figure
keyFigure.description: The measurement is considered important to the team and/or department. If the measurement is registered for a product, it is also displayed as a key figure for the parent department.

resultIndicator.label: Result indicator
resultIndicator.description: The measurement is considered especially important as an indicator of achievement. If the measurement is registered for a product, it is also displayed as a result indicator for the parent department.

kpi.heading: Measurements

help.updates: Measurements can be updated both manually through the OKR Tracker and automatically using a Google Sheets- or API-integration. Note that it is only possible to register a single value within a day. Read more about creating and updating measurements {readMoreLink} (in Norwegian).
help.apiProgress: New measurements can be registered with {apiLink} calls, for instance by using curl as shown below.
help.resultIndicatorWarning: Result indicators are considered indicators of the organization's effect and target achievement, and should therefore be clarified with the organization's management before creation.

automation.title: Automated progression
automation.error: An error has occurred while updating progression for this measurement.
automation.radio: Fetch values automatically from a spreadsheet (Google Sheets)?

goals.help: Measurements can have progression goals for specific periods. These are drawn in the diagram together with the progression graph.

validation.alpha_dash: My contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
validation.alpha_spaces: May only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
validation.digits: Must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
validation.max: May not be greater than {length} characters
validation.mimes: Must have a valid file type

general.selectObjectivesInPeriod: Select all objectives in this period
general.selectRange: Select a start and end date
general.formErrors: The form contains errors that must be corrected.

login.loading: We are signing you in, please wait

error.providerError: Could not sign in. Please contact system administrator if the error persists.

add.product: Created new product. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds
add.department: Created new department. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds
add.organization: Created new organization. Please wait, you will be redirected in 5 seconds

request.error: Could not send request. Please try again.
request.requestExists: Access request with email {user} already exists.

automation.sheetsTabHelp: The tab name in Google Sheets

weight.label: Weight
weight.help: Progression for each key result is by default weighted equally (1) when calculating the overall progression for an objective. It is possible to override this for each key result individually by changing the value below.

keyResult.autoHelpText: The value for this key result gets updated automatically from Google Sheets.
keyResult.autoError: Issue fetching data from Google Sheets:

api.tooltip: Toggle this if you have plans to update your Key Results yourself via the OKR-tracker API - you can still update manually as well

keyResult.apiAndKeyRes: We do not recommend toggling both at the same time. This may create problem your Key Result progression

tooltip.periodEnd: You are not allowed to edit after a period has ended

item.slugChangeInfo: When changing the name of this item, the address to it might also change. In that case you will be automatically redirected after saving the form.
item.redirectInfo: You will be redirected in {count} seconds.

admin.apiSecret: If you are using the API to update key results and/or measurements, you need to write an API Secret UUID here for the API call header (okr-team-secret)

users.registerUsersText: Insert email addresses (one address per line):

admin.noObjectiveSelected: Select objective to view key results

notes.empty: Notes can only be seen by team members

empty.noKeyResultProgress: This key result has no registered values.
empty.noKPIProgress: This measurement has no registered values.
empty.noKPIProgressInPeriod: This measurement has no registered values in the period.

noKeyResults.heading: No key results
noKeyResults.body: Oops! Could not find any key results.

noKPIs.heading: No measurements
noKPIs.body: Oops! Could not find any measurements.
noKPIs.adminBody: Add measurements that show what you have accomplished!

noObjectives.heading: No objectives here!
noObjectives.body: It looks like there are no objectives and key results here ...

noObjectivesInPeriod.heading: No objectives in selected period
noObjectivesInPeriod.body: No objectives registered within the selected period.

archived.heading: Archived

body.objective: This objective is archived and is no longer shown in the list of objectives.
body.keyResult: This key result is archived and is no longer shown in the list of key results.
body.organization: This organization is archived and no longer visible.
body.department: This department is archived and no longer visible.
body.product: This product is archived and no longer visible.

archived.restoreText: If you miss it, just restore it.

sheets.infoText: Note! The following address must be given read access to the Google Sheets document:
sheets.400: Couldn't read any data. Is the Google Sheets tab name correct?
sheets.403: The system doesn't have read access to the Google Sheets document.
sheets.404: Could not find the Google Sheets document. Wrong URL?

history.title: History
history.overwriteWarning: Note: This change will overwrite existing value for chosen date ({date}): {value}.

user.hasSuperAdmin: Is sitewide administrator for the OKR-tracker
user.hasAdmin: Has admin rights for some organizations

dashboard.noRIs: The department doesn't have any result indicators.

integration.info: Our API offers endpoints to automate updating of key results and measurements. In order to make use of the API, an API client must be created. For each client, an unique ID and secret is generated which must be added as request headers ({clientIdHeader}, {clientSecretHeader}) to each API call. This in addition to a separate API key ({apiKeyHeader}). It is recommended to create a separate client for each application that integrates with the API. This makes it easier to keep track of each application and secrets in use.

empty.heading: No clients
empty.body: Add one or more clients here in order to make use of our API. This makes it easy to automate updating of key results and/or measurements.

warning.secret: The secret above must be copied and stored in a safe location. It's only shown this one time. It's OK, {closeLink}!
warning.delete: When deleting, all running applications which uses this client will stop working.
warning.rotate: When rotating, all running applications which uses the old secret will stop working.
warning.deprecation: It is no longer possible to add/edit the API secret here. Please visit the 'integrations' tab in order to create a new API client. The old secret wil still work for the time being:
